rows: There are 4 balls in a box. 2 of them are soccer balls and the rest are basketballs. How many are basketballs?
Anita has 5 books. 3 of them are science books and the rest are storybooks. How many are storybooks?
Harper and Raven drew 8 pictures together. Harper drew 3 pictures. How many pictures did Raven draw?
Brittany has 7 shirts in her closet. 3 of them are blue and the rest are green. How many green shirts does she have?
Ms. Jones ordered 8 bags of sugar. 5 bags are delivered today. The rest will be delivered tomorrow. How many bags of sugar will be delivered tomorrow?
